name: dart
description: DART Academy is an eLearning platform that helps older adults recognize and avoid scams, enhancing their digital safety.
author: Joss Tripoli

scripts.make-all-models: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Users --attributes name:string,email:string,avatar:string,avatar_img:string,role_play:string,password:string,password_reset_token:string,password_reset_expires:date,email_verification_token:string,email_verified:boolean,google:string,account_type:string,newsletter_consent:boolean --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name NarrationSettings --attributes user_id:integer,mute:boolean,speed:float,word_highlighting:boolean,sentence_highlighting:boolean --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Badges --attributes user_id:integer,module:string,section:string,type:string,name:string,image_url:string,earned_at:date --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Courses --attributes title:string,description:text,level:string,link:string,image_link:string,keywords:ARRAY:string,duration:integer --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Enrollments --attributes user_id:integer,course_id:integer,enrollment_date:date --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Lessons --attributes course_id:integer,title:string,subtitle:string,duration:float,image:string,link:string,imagelink:string,keywords:ARRAY:string --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Tags --attributes name:string --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name CourseTags --attributes course_id:integer,tag_id:integer --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Quizzes --attributes lesson_id:integer,title:string,description:text --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Questions --attributes quiz_id:integer,progress:float,type:string,partial:string,prompt:text,explanation:text --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Answers --attributes question_id:integer,correct_answer:text --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Choices --attributes question_id:integer,choice_key:string,text:text,explanation:text --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Scores --attributes user_id:integer,quiz_id:integer,score_total:float,correct_answers:integer,timestamp:date --underscored && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name UserActivity --attributes user_id:integer,activity_type:string,activity_date:date,page_accessed:string,module_name:string,ip_address:string,geo_location:string,browser:string,os:string,current_streak:integer,longest_streak:integer,last_access_date:date --underscored
scripts.make-all-models-force: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Users --attributes name:string,email:string,avatar:string,avatar_img:string,role_play:string,password:string,password_reset_token:string,password_reset_expires:date,email_verification_token:string,email_verified:boolean,google:string,account_type:string,newsletter_consent:boolean --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name NarrationSettings --attributes user_id:integer,mute:boolean,speed:float,word_highlighting:boolean,sentence_highlighting:boolean --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Badges --attributes user_id:integer,module:string,section:string,type:string,name:string,image_url:string,earned_at:date --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Courses --attributes title:string,description:text,level:string,link:string,image_link:string,keywords:ARRAY:string,duration:integer --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Enrollments --attributes user_id:integer,course_id:integer,enrollment_date:date --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Lessons --attributes course_id:integer,title:string,subtitle:string,duration:float,image:string,link:string,imagelink:string,keywords:ARRAY:string --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Tags --attributes name:string --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name CourseTags --attributes course_id:integer,tag_id:integer --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Quizzes --attributes lesson_id:integer,title:string,description:text --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Questions --attributes quiz_id:integer,progress:float,type:string,partial:string,prompt:text,explanation:text --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Answers --attributes question_id:integer,correct_answer:text --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Choices --attributes question_id:integer,choice_key:string,text:text,explanation:text --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Scores --attributes user_id:integer,quiz_id:integer,score_total:float,correct_answers:integer,timestamp:date --underscored --force && npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name UserActivity --attributes user_id:integer,activity_type:string,activity_date:date,page_accessed:string,module_name:string,ip_address:string,geo_location:string,browser:string,os:string,current_streak:integer,longest_streak:integer,last_access_date:date --underscored --force
